31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Amr b. Shu'aib: on his father's authority, told that his grandfather reported the Prophet (ﷺ) said: A slave who has entered into an agreement to purchase his freedom is a slave as long as a dirham of the agreed price remains to be paid

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمُكَاتَبِ يُؤَدِّي بَعْضَ كِتَابَتِهِ فَيَعْجِزُ أَوْ يَمُوتُ
chapter.eng-name: If A Mukathib Pays Part Of His Contract Of Manumission Then Becomes Incapacitated Or Dies
